subSections.title: Noun
Noun
Troponyms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|会%釈|え%しゃく}}: a [[slight]] bow
* {{ja-r|目%礼|もく%れい}}: a [[nod]] to a person
* {{ja-r|黙%礼|もく%れい}}: a [[silent]] bow
* {{ja-r|最%敬%礼|さい%けい%れい}}: a respectful bow, a low bow
* {{ja-r|叩%頭|こう%とう}}: a deep bow, a [[kowtow]], a bow where one touches one's head to the floor or ground

subSections.title: Compounds
